title: Nearly at my 1000th win! Can I play with some Riot employees?
body:
I heard a while back you could play with Riot people for your 1000th win! Im currently at 996/7 and was wondering if this is still a thing? Not sure if this is the right board for this :P
My IGN is Skwaddle 
Update: I'm on my 999th win! Soo close!

replies.body: If you say **Sephyre** 3 times in arrow she might come here and potentially give you a chance to add her.
pretty sure Sephyre isn't a girl. can guarantee!

You've seen Sephyre naked?

This is news.
I tried to add you ingame man but your summoner name was not found...
Damn just checked match history and they lost rip {{champion:26}}
Shhh I like to keep that a close guarded secret
IDK you carried in ranked riot 5s. A while ago
nah he is definately bad... but I know the worst rioter of all though, corrupt to their very core, in game and in life, their sole purpose in life is ksing their adc...
I know all of the rioters dark secrets :) you probably have the most after Mindstar >:)

Thank you soo much guys! You really made my day! Shame we lost but it was a good game! I really just wanted to say thanks to MasterMirkinen, Maraudaur and Riot Ferlyn for making it such a good time! You guys really went the extra mile today guys, and it means alot!
Im keen for my 2000th win! We'll win next time for sure! 
Keep up the fantastic work guys, 
Peace~
Yea, they will pick it up soon no doubt.
